net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format

Class SegmentConstant

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format.Segment
      • net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format.SegmentConstant

  • public class SegmentConstant
extends Segment
    This class represents a Segment that has a constant value. The stream data has to contain these bytes in order to match the according ContentType.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • validateNonRecursive

        protected void validateNonRecursive(StringBuilder source)
        Description copied from class: Segment
        This method validates this segment to ensure the correctness of the configured format.
        ATTENTION:
        This method does NOT perform a recursive validation of potential sub-segments.
        Overrides:
        validateNonRecursive in class Segment
        Parameters:
        source - describes the source of the validation.

      • parseBytes

        static byte[] parseBytes(String bytes,
                         String source)
        This method parses the given bytes from source to byte[].
        Parameters:
        bytes - are the bytes encoded as String in the form HH([-]HH)* where HH is a hex encoded byte ([0-9A-F]{2}). Example: "FE-7A-32-BB".
        source - describes where the given bytes origin from. This is only used in case of an error for the exception message.
        Returns:
        the converted byte array.

      • initBytes

        protected void initBytes(StringBuilder source)
        This method initializes the internal byte array.
        Parameters:
        source - describes the source.

      • getEncoding

        public String getEncoding()
        This method gets the encoding used to convert a string provided in XML to bytes. The encoding defaults to UTF-8 if not explicitly set.
